{{Description|It is said the legacy of the ancient art of resisting non-human beings with but a mortal body can be traced back to the Lochknights who resisted the Remurian Empire.<br>Be that as it may, so long as one can find a way to control the level of force used, it's not as if it cannot be used in duels against ordinary opponents.}}
'''Last Lightfall''' is [[Clorinde]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].
